definition: king or monarch/best or strongest of its type/grand/great
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: Swear your fealty to the Wizard's Throne.
sentences.chinese: 请在巫师王座面前，宣誓你的忠诚。

sentences.english: To the left of the thrones, near the window.
sentences.chinese: 在王座的左面，靠近窗户。

sentences.english: The throne of limestone was hoed by the farmers on canoe.
sentences.chinese: 石灰王座被独木船上之农民锄坏了。

sentences.english: Maybe Bastin had a pretender to his throne after all.
sentences.chinese: 或者巴斯丁的王座终于有人来继承了。

sentences.english: Obviously he was not as dead as he seemed at the end of The Frozen Throne.
sentences.chinese: 显然他并没有像冰封王座结尾那样被杀死。

sentences.english: Arthas slays Illidan and reaches the Frozen Throne.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔塞斯击败伊利迪安，到达冰封王座。

sentences.english: When will you release the next chapter of the bonus orc campaign?
sentences.chinese: 你们什么时候放出寒冰王座中附加兽人战役的下一章？

sentences.english: In Greek mythology, Cepheus represents a King of Ethiopia.
sentences.chinese: 在希腊神话中，仙王座象征着埃塞俄比亚的国王。

sentences.english: How many kings step down from their thrones?
sentences.chinese: 有多少帝王甘愿步下他们的王座？

sentences.english: In the case of Cepheus, the tip of the roof (a star known as Gamma Cephei, or Er Rai) points generally northward.
sentences.chinese: 就仙王座来说，房顶的尖端大体上指向南方。

sentences.english: The king was addressed as "Your Majesty".
sentences.chinese: 女王威严地坐在王座上。

sentences.english: There is something behind the throne greater than the king him-self.
sentences.chinese: 在王座的后面还有比国王本人更伟大东西。

sentences.english: We are the Usurpers to the Heavenly Thrones .
sentences.chinese: 我们是神圣王座的篡夺者。

sentences.english: Shireen will one day sit the Iron Throne and rule the Seven Kingdoms.
sentences.chinese: 希琳日后会坐上铁王座，统治七王国。

sentences.english: And somewhere Emperor Stern is laughing softly on his dark throne.
sentences.chinese: 斯特恩大帝肯定在什么地方坐在王座上微微地笑着。

sentences.english: My parents rise out of their thrones into the milky rooms of clouds.
sentences.chinese: 我的父母从他们的王座中升起进入云朵的乳状屋宇。

definition: the most honorable/the most respected/supreme/(archaic) the emperor
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
main hall of a Buddhist temple
